Build 20021105

Adding Lynne as this appears to be an Styled Text issue.
Note that Auto Build was off for this.

I marked the bug as duplicate but like Tod I also assume that something changed
in SWT because we didn't change editor code in that area and the errors started
to appear. I assume that upon closing of an editor the text widget is
removed/set to null earlier than before.

I released a fix which handles the dispose more graceful.

Lynne, could you comment on my SWT comments.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 25812 ***

The problem is that an invalid range is being specified by the ProblemPainter 
(i.e., the range is greater than the length of the content or less than 0).  
I'm not sure how disposing could affect this - perhaps the content is reset to 
empty and therefore the range specified by ProblemPainter is invalid.  Can you 
reproduce the problem?
I haven't been able to get it to happen consistently.
